ritualSteps.title: Cleanse the Body
ritualSteps.content: Pass a whole raw egg over your body, moving from the top downwards, mentally focusing on eliminating any negative psychic debris.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose of the Egg
ritualSteps.content: Take the egg outside, far from your home, and smash it on the ground. Return home via a different, circuitous route without looking back.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the Water
ritualSteps.content: Add at least one cup of Florida Water and one cup of sea salt to a tub filled with warm water.

ritualSteps.title: Add Vinegar
ritualSteps.content: Add a generous splash of Four Thieves Vinegar into the tub.

ritualSteps.title: Add Essential Oil
ritualSteps.content: Just before you enter the water, add nine drops of essential oil of rosemary.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Submerge yourself completely to destroy all evil influences.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Water
ritualSteps.content: Carry ocean water to the area to be cleansed in a glass or metal flask.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge
ritualSteps.content: Asperge the space as needed, ideally using a fresh rosemary wand to flick the water.

ritualSteps.title: Soak Pine
ritualSteps.content: Soak pine needles in warm water until the water is infused.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the infused water throughout your home as needed.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Hydrosols
ritualSteps.content: Blend equal parts of juniper berry hydrosol and yarrow hydrosol.

ritualSteps.title: Add Berries
ritualSteps.content: Add a small handful of slightly bruised dried juniper berries to the liquid.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle or wipe your altar, aura, or crystals with the liquid.

ritualSteps.title: Sweep
ritualSteps.content: Use a broom to sweep the dust of your home from the west to the east.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose
ritualSteps.content: Collect the gathered dust, burn it, and toss the ashes outdoors.

ritualSteps.title: Light Candle
ritualSteps.content: Light a coconut-scented candle in the space needing purification.

ritualSteps.title: Purify
ritualSteps.content: Allow the scent of the coconut to permeate the air, releasing long-term spiritual purification in a relaxed manner.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Herbs
ritualSteps.content: Blend dried basil, frankincense, rosemary, rue, and yarrow, and grind into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Base
ritualSteps.content: Blend the herbal powder into a base of arrowroot powder.

ritualSteps.title: Sprinkle
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder lightly through the area to absorb malignancies in the air.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Coals
ritualSteps.content: Light charcoal in a fireproof dish or censer.

ritualSteps.title: Burn Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle frankincense, myrrh, or sage on the lit charcoal.

ritualSteps.title: Waft Smoke
ritualSteps.content: Direct the cleansing smoke towards whatever needs cleansing.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the dried herb betony on hot charcoals.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate
ritualSteps.content: Let the smoke disperse negative energy, especially if you fear the negativity emanates from yourself.

ritualSteps.title: Burn Birch
ritualSteps.content: Light birch bark and twigs on fire.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse
ritualSteps.content: Allow the smoke to permeate the area to remove negative energy.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Blend camphor, cinnamon, frankincense, myrrh, and sandalwood together.

ritualSteps.title: Powder
ritualSteps.content: Grind the blended ingredients into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto lit charcoal and burn.

ritualSteps.title: Burn Resin
ritualSteps.content: Burn dragon's blood powder or resin on lit charcoals to provide a potent cleansing.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Peel
ritualSteps.content: Place reserved garlic peel in a mortar and pestle, add brown sugar, and pound them together.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the mixture onto lit charcoal or a cast iron pan.

ritualSteps.title: Waft Fumes
ritualSteps.content: Waft the fumes over the areas to be cleansed, allowing the aroma to settle.

ritualSteps.title: Blend
ritualSteps.content: Blend frankincense, liquidambar, mastic, and sandalwood.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the mixture on lit charcoals and waft the smoke as desired.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Blend and grind benzoin, dragon's blood, frankincense, myrrh, sandalwood, and sea salt into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto a lit charcoal and burn.

ritualSteps.title: Ring Bell
ritualSteps.content: Ring a silver, iron, or brass bell loudly throughout the space to disperse malevolent entities and negative debris.

ritualSteps.title: Play Bowl
ritualSteps.content: Play a Himalayan singing bowl to wash the space and balance yin and yang energies before ritual.

ritualSteps.title: Boil Vinegar
ritualSteps.content: Boil rice vinegar in a shallow pan until it is steaming.

ritualSteps.title: Carry Steam
ritualSteps.content: Very carefully carry the steaming pan through all the rooms, letting the vapors cleanse corners and closets.

ritualSteps.title: Toss Coals
ritualSteps.content: Toss burning coals into a bowl of water to create a sizzling steam for quick purification.

ritualSteps.title: Make Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion from dried agrimony and peppermint using boiling water.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Bucket
ritualSteps.content: Strain out the herbs and add the infusion liquid to a bucket of water, along with white vinegar.

ritualSteps.title: Wash Floors
ritualSteps.content: Cleanse the floors and surfaces with the wash.

ritualSteps.title: Make Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Pour boiling water over dragon's tears (annatto seeds) to make a strong infusion.

ritualSteps.title: Wash Floors
ritualSteps.content: Add the infusion to a bucket of rinse water with vinegar and scrub the floors.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Water
ritualSteps.content: Fill a bucket with ocean water. Add Cascarilla Powder, agar-agar, and powdered kelp.

ritualSteps.title: Wash Floors
ritualSteps.content: Use this water to wash your space and magically cleanse the area.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Coconut
ritualSteps.content: Take a mouthful of rum and spray it over a whole coconut. Sprinkle Cascarilla Powder on the coconut.

ritualSteps.title: Roll Through House
ritualSteps.content: Roll the coconut from the back corner of your home out through the main entrance.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose at Crossroads
ritualSteps.content: Take the coconut to a remote four-way crossroads, throw it hard to crack it open, and walk away without looking back.

ritualSteps.title: Spread Petals
ritualSteps.content: Spread day Jessamine petals throughout the house for spiritual cleansing and to remove malevolent magic.

ritualSteps.title: Hold Lodestones
ritualSteps.content: Hold two matched pairs of lodestones (four total) in your hands.

ritualSteps.title: Absorb Negativity
ritualSteps.content: Slowly move through the area in a sunwise direction, encouraging the lodestones to absorb all negativity.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse Lodestones
ritualSteps.content: Cleanse the lodestones intensively or bury them in the earth afterward.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Herbs
ritualSteps.content: Grind chamomile, elder, mint, mugwort, yarrow, and other herbs into a powder.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the powder and waft the smoke into all corners and crevices of the home.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over High John the Conqueror roots.

ritualSteps.title: Moisten Salt
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the infusion lightly on salt to moisten it, and let it dry out.

ritualSteps.title: Scatter
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the salt around your home to absorb negativity.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Pan
ritualSteps.content: Fill a pan with equal parts Florida Water and Holy Water. Add one camphor square.

ritualSteps.title: Position
ritualSteps.content: Keep the pan under the bed or in a strategic location to absorb negativity.

ritualSteps.title: Replace
ritualSteps.content: Change the water once a week or if it starts to smell off.

ritualSteps.title: Chop Onion
ritualSteps.content: Chop one unpeeled onion into quarters by hand.

ritualSteps.title: Place
ritualSteps.content: Place one piece in each corner of a room overnight.

ritualSteps.title: Bury
ritualSteps.content: Bury them outside the following day. Repeat for five consecutive nights.

ritualSteps.title: Place Rice
ritualSteps.content: Place an uncovered bowl of raw white rice out to absorb negative energy.

ritualSteps.title: Discard
ritualSteps.content: Replace with fresh rice weekly, discarding the old rice outside the house.

ritualSteps.title: Place Vinegar
ritualSteps.content: Place plain vinegar in shallow uncovered pans throughout an area.

ritualSteps.title: Replace
ritualSteps.content: Replace weekly or when the liquid looks odd to maintain the absorbent cleansing effect.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion of desert sage.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add it to your bath to cleanse and purify yourself.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over Earth Smoke (Fumitory).

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Strain and add the liquid to your bath.

ritualSteps.title: Apply
ritualSteps.content: Undress completely and rub or sprinkle Florida Water all over yourself, including the soles of the feet and top of the head.

ritualSteps.title: Dry
ritualSteps.content: Allow yourself to air-dry before getting dressed.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Indigo Water
ritualSteps.content: Place Turkish blue eye beads into a bottle of Indigo Water to boost power.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Strain the Indigo Water into your bathwater and soak.

ritualSteps.title: Add Lavender
ritualSteps.content: Add essential oil of lavender, lavender hydrosol, or an infusion to the bath.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Soak in the water for spiritual and physical cleansing.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Root
ritualSteps.content: Grind and powder a dried lovage root.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto your bathwater, distribute well, and soak.

ritualSteps.title: Soak Mandrake
ritualSteps.content: Soak a true mandrake root in warm water overnight or for three days. Remove the root.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the soaking liquid to a tub filled with water and bathe.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse Tea
ritualSteps.content: Create a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over dried maté tea.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Strain the cooled liquid and add it to your bath, or sponge it over yourself. Air dry.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Faucet Bag
ritualSteps.content: Crumble five oak leaves into a muslin bag and attach it to the tub's faucet so water runs through it.

ritualSteps.title: Float Leaves
ritualSteps.content: Float five whole oak leaves in the bath water.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Enter the bath and rub your body with the floating leaves.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over an entire bunch of parsley and one sliced parsley root.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the infusion to bathwater and soak.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over combined pine needles and bay leaves.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the strained water to your bath, together with a splash of vinegar and slices of lemon.

ritualSteps.title: Pound Roots
ritualSteps.content: Pound dry yucca roots.

ritualSteps.title: Make Suds
ritualSteps.content: Whisk them into cold water to create suds.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse
ritualSteps.content: Use to cleanse yourself, especially your head and hair.

ritualSteps.title: Blend
ritualSteps.content: Blend benzoin, dragon's blood, and sandalwood.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate
ritualSteps.content: Burn the blend on hot charcoals and pass yourself through the smoke.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over nine bay laurel leaves and two tablespoons of anise seeds.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Let it cool, strain out the botanicals, and add the liquid to your tub of water.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Bath
ritualSteps.content: Add one cup of salt and one cup of vinegar (lemon, apple cider, or rice) to a bath.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Soak in the water to remove psychic debris quickly.

ritualSteps.title: Powder
ritualSteps.content: Dry garden sage and grind it into a fine powder with a mortar and pestle.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto a charcoal and use it to fumigate the body.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Salts
ritualSteps.content: Blend two cups of sea salt with one-half cup of baking soda.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the mixture to the bath to simultaneously provide spiritual cleansing and create a psychic shield.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Tub
ritualSteps.content: Fill the tub with water and throw in seven red roses, a handful of sea salt, a splash of vinegar, and a squeeze of lemon juice.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Spend exactly seven minutes in the bath, rubbing yourself with the roses and submerging periodically.

ritualSteps.title: Dry
ritualSteps.content: Dry off with a clean towel and leave the tub uncleaned for at least an hour while your aura stabilizes.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the candle
ritualSteps.content: Find or create a candle shaped to resemble your companion animal.

ritualSteps.title: Carve information
ritualSteps.content: Carve the animal's identifying information or protective runes onto the candle.

ritualSteps.title: Anoint and burn
ritualSteps.content: Anoint the candle with Protection Oil and burn it to cast the shield.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the image
ritualSteps.content: Take a photograph of your pet. Paint protective runes or hieroglyphs on the image.

ritualSteps.title: Anoint
ritualSteps.content: Anoint the image carefully with Protection Oil.

ritualSteps.title: Store safely
ritualSteps.content: Keep the image in a safe, discreet spot, touching it up periodically with oil to maintain the spell.

ritualSteps.title: Create infusion
ritualSteps.content: Create an infusion by pouring boiling water over red clover.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Allow the water to cool and strain out the solid botanicals.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Use the infused liquid to bathe your animals to keep them protected and thriving.

ritualSteps.title: Brew the wash
ritualSteps.content: Pour boiling water over mugwort and allow it to steep until cool.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Strain out the botanical materials to prepare the wash.

ritualSteps.title: Wash
ritualSteps.content: Wash the animal with the infusion to break any spells cast upon them.

ritualSteps.title: Hold your ground
ritualSteps.content: When faced with a threatening dog, hold your ground calmly.

ritualSteps.title: Recite the charm
ritualSteps.content: Recite three times: 'Dog, hold your nose to the ground! Creator made you, me and hound. In the name of the triple goddess, Selene, Artemis and Hecate.'

ritualSteps.title: Draw symbol
ritualSteps.content: Form a protective cross or pentacle symbol in the air.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the bag
ritualSteps.content: Place dried avens inside a medicine or mojo bag.

ritualSteps.title: Carry for safety
ritualSteps.content: Carry the bag with you when entering territories where fierce creatures reside.

ritualSteps.title: Harvest juniper
ritualSteps.content: Harvest a sprig of fresh or dried juniper.

ritualSteps.title: Carry
ritualSteps.content: Carry the sprig with you to magically protect against attacks by fierce animals.

ritualSteps.title: Strike the rock
ritualSteps.content: Hammer a rusty or coffin nail against a flat rock. Do not pierce it, just score it three times.

ritualSteps.title: Visualize
ritualSteps.content: Visualize what you are dispelling while you hammer the nail.

ritualSteps.title: Bury the stone
ritualSteps.content: Bury the stone far away from your home.

ritualSteps.title: Carry the nail
ritualSteps.content: Carry the nail in a red mojo bag, optionally with crossroads dirt.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare chicory
ritualSteps.content: Gather dried chicory.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the chicory on a lit charcoal disc in a fire-safe container.

ritualSteps.title: Clear the space
ritualSteps.content: Allow the smoke to clear negative emotions and energy from the premises.

ritualSteps.title: Grind ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Grind asafetida, cayenne pepper, and sulfur into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Sprinkle
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle this powder on and around the target's front doorstep or path.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare garlic
ritualSteps.content: Gather a braid of twelve whole garlic heads.

ritualSteps.title: Hang
ritualSteps.content: Hang the braid over the main door of your home to banish jealousy and the Evil Eye.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare nettles
ritualSteps.content: Gather dried nettles safely using gloves.

ritualSteps.title: Burn and focus
ritualSteps.content: Burn them on a charcoal disc in a fire-safe dish while focusing heavily on your banishing desires.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the bath
ritualSteps.content: Run a tub filled with warm water.

ritualSteps.title: Add oils
ritualSteps.content: Add essential oils of clary sage, frankincense, lavender, lemongrass, and rosemary to the water.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe and affirm
ritualSteps.content: Enter the bath, inhale the fragrance deeply, and accompany the soak with affirmations and positive visualizations.

ritualSteps.title: Hold the crystal
ritualSteps.content: Hold a double-terminated crystal or amethyst in your hands.

ritualSteps.title: Focus
ritualSteps.content: Focus your intent deeply on breaking your destructive pattern.

ritualSteps.title: Carry
ritualSteps.content: Carry the crystal with you, cleansing it regularly.

ritualSteps.title: Brew infusion
ritualSteps.content: Pour boiling water over dried eucalyptus leaves to create an infusion. Let it steep.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Strain the botanical material from the liquid.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the infusion to your bathwater and soak to destroy the ties of bad habits.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain bamboo
ritualSteps.content: Obtain dry bamboo sticks with distinct knots.

ritualSteps.title: Burn to pop
ritualSteps.content: Burn the bamboo sticks in a fire so that the popping sound of the knots scares the house demons away.

ritualSteps.title: Dress candle
ritualSteps.content: Dress a Double Action candle with Dragon's Blood Oil.

ritualSteps.title: Burn completely
ritualSteps.content: Burn the candle down completely in the room to keep the area free from malevolent spirits.

ritualSteps.title: Blend ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Blend together benzoin, frankincense, and juniper.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the mixture on lit charcoal to disperse evil from the atmosphere.

ritualSteps.title: Blend
ritualSteps.content: Blend together benzoin, patchouli, and sandalwood.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate
ritualSteps.content: Burn the incense on lit charcoal to banish malicious entities.

ritualSteps.title: Gather tools
ritualSteps.content: Gather household iron or steel tools and implements.

ritualSteps.title: Place strategically
ritualSteps.content: Place them strategically around the area to repel the elven folk.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare infusion
ritualSteps.content: Prepare an infusion using fenugreek seeds and boiling water.

ritualSteps.title: Cool and apply
ritualSteps.content: Let the liquid cool to a safe temperature. Wash your head with the infusion for protection.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain true jet
ritualSteps.content: Obtain a piece of true jet (synthetic jet will not burn).

ritualSteps.title: Powder and burn
ritualSteps.content: Powder the jet and burn it on a charcoal disc to exorcise malevolent spirits.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare fumitory
ritualSteps.content: Gather dried fumitory, also known as Earth smoke.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the fumitory in a fire-safe container, allowing the smoke to fill the area and banish the entities.

ritualSteps.title: Light the sage
ritualSteps.content: Light a bundle or loose leaves of white sage in a fire-safe dish.

ritualSteps.title: Smudge the area
ritualSteps.content: Waft the smoke around the area to banish evil spirits and negative entities.

ritualSteps.title: Blend oils
ritualSteps.content: Blend frankincense, vetiver, honeysuckle absolute, and rose attar into a base of sweet almond oil.

ritualSteps.title: Apply to body
ritualSteps.content: Massage the oil onto your body before sleep, or add it to bathwater, to keep malicious spirits far away.

ritualSteps.title: Grind botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Grind frankincense, honeysuckle blossoms, roses, and vetiver roots into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Burn the powder
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder onto lit charcoal and burn incessantly until the perceived danger is over.

ritualSteps.title: Light charcoal
ritualSteps.content: Light a charcoal disc in a fire-safe container.

ritualSteps.title: Sprinkle turmeric
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle ground turmeric onto the lit charcoal, allowing the fragrance to repel malicious spirits.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain witch balls
ritualSteps.content: Obtain iridescent colored glass witch balls.

ritualSteps.title: Place strategically
ritualSteps.content: Place them strategically around your home, property, or windows to disperse evil.

ritualSteps.title: Gather botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Gather acorns, mistletoe, and oak bark.

ritualSteps.title: Burn and murmur
ritualSteps.content: Burn them together on a charcoal disc while murmuring your desire for the spirits to leave.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain chalk
ritualSteps.content: Obtain plain white chalk.

ritualSteps.title: Draw boundaries
ritualSteps.content: Draw boundary lines and protective circles around your home to prevent entry.

ritualSteps.title: Set up the altar
ritualSteps.content: Set up an altar space with images or rubber toys of cleansing scavenger animals like vultures or crows.

ritualSteps.title: Ring with crystals
ritualSteps.content: Ring the animals with amethyst, malachite, and quartz crystals.

ritualSteps.title: Light the candle
ritualSteps.content: Place a charged white candle in the center and light it, visualizing the flame sucking all negativity into the fire to be purified.

ritualSteps.title: Focus on the image
ritualSteps.content: Look directly into the eyes of a realistic image of a vulture with outstretched wings.

ritualSteps.title: Request cleansing
ritualSteps.content: Request that she come and cleanse you of all spiritual debris.

ritualSteps.title: Visualize
ritualSteps.content: Visualize the vulture enfolding you with her wings. When she releases you and departs, you are cleansed.

ritualSteps.title: Brew the infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over black cohosh (black snake root).

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the wand
ritualSteps.content: Gather a fresh rosemary wand.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge
ritualSteps.content: Use the rosemary wand to asperge the area with the cooled liquid to erase evil influences.

ritualSteps.title: Gather water
ritualSteps.content: Carry ocean water to the area to be cleansed in a glass or metal flask. Request permission and offer thanks to the Spirits of the Sea.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge the space
ritualSteps.content: Asperge the room as needed, ideally with a rosemary or sea lavender wand.

ritualSteps.title: Brew the root
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over peony roots.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge
ritualSteps.content: Let the liquid cool, then asperge the infusion around the area as desired.

ritualSteps.title: Soak the needles
ritualSteps.content: Soak pine needles in warm water until the water is fragrant.

ritualSteps.title: Asperge
ritualSteps.content: Use the liquid to asperge the space as needed.

ritualSteps.title: Sweep the dust
ritualSteps.content: Use any broom to sweep the dust from the west to the east of the room.

ritualSteps.title: Burn and discard
ritualSteps.content: Burn this dust and toss the ashes outdoors.

ritualSteps.title: Mop and protect
ritualSteps.content: Complete the ritual by mopping the floors with a magical floorwash.

ritualSteps.title: Blend the oil
ritualSteps.content: Create Blessing Oil by adding frankincense and benzoin to a blend of olive and jojoba oils.

ritualSteps.title: Dress the candle
ritualSteps.content: Dress white or blue candles with the oil.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the candle to purify the atmosphere.

ritualSteps.title: Grind botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Blend dried basil, frankincense, rosemary, and yarrow, and grind them into a fine powder.

ritualSteps.title: Mix with base
ritualSteps.content: Blend this powder into an arrowroot powder base.

ritualSteps.title: Sprinkle
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder as needed to clear out negative vibrations.

ritualSteps.title: Select botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Select protective and purifying botanicals like frankincense or white sage.

ritualSteps.title: Ignite charcoal
ritualSteps.content: Ignite a charcoal disc in a fire-safe dish.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the botanicals on the charcoal and waft the smoke to cleanse the area.

ritualSteps.title: Gather betony
ritualSteps.content: Gather dried betony herb.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the herb on a charcoal disc to magically disperse negative energy and lurking entities.

ritualSteps.title: Gather birch
ritualSteps.content: Gather birch bark and small twigs.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn them safely in a fire-safe cauldron to remove negative energy from the space.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain cedarwood
ritualSteps.content: Obtain cedarwood chips or needles.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn them in an incense burner to purify the atmosphere.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare resin
ritualSteps.content: Obtain dragon's blood resin or powder.

ritualSteps.title: Burn and cleanse
ritualSteps.content: Burn it on a charcoal disc to provide potent space cleansing and neutralize negative energy.

ritualSteps.title: Blend resins
ritualSteps.content: Blend dragon's blood powder and frankincense.

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the mixture on a charcoal disc to provide a powerful and sacred cleansing.

ritualSteps.title: Obtain a bell
ritualSteps.content: Obtain a silver, iron, or brass bell.

ritualSteps.title: Ring vigorously
ritualSteps.content: Ring the bell loudly and vigorously throughout the space to disturb and repel malicious spirits.

ritualSteps.title: Heat coals
ritualSteps.content: Light charcoal coals until they are burning hot.

ritualSteps.title: Create steam
ritualSteps.content: Carefully toss the burning coals into a bowl of water to create a sudden burst of purifying steam.

ritualSteps.title: Create infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion of dried agrimony and peppermint in boiling water.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the wash
ritualSteps.content: Strain the herbs and add the liquid to a bucket of water with white vinegar.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse the floors
ritualSteps.content: Cleanse the floors and surfaces with the wash to repel hexes.

ritualSteps.title: Place the crystals
ritualSteps.content: Place large amethysts in the corners of the room.

ritualSteps.title: Let them absorb
ritualSteps.content: Allow them to sit and absorb negative energy from the atmosphere.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse the stones
ritualSteps.content: When they begin to look dull, spiritually cleanse and recharge them.

ritualSteps.title: Chop the onion
ritualSteps.content: Chop one unpeeled onion into quarters by hand (do not use a food processor).

ritualSteps.title: Place in corners
ritualSteps.content: Place one piece in each corner of the room and leave overnight.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose
ritualSteps.content: Bury the pieces outside the following day. Repeat for five consecutive nights if necessary.

ritualSteps.title: Light the Candle
ritualSteps.content: Burn a white candle dedicated to Saint Benedict.

ritualSteps.title: Present the Offering
ritualSteps.content: Offer Saint Benedict a glass of brandy or Benedictine.

ritualSteps.title: Make the Petition
ritualSteps.content: Make your petition of healing to the saint.

ritualSteps.title: Watch for the Sign
ritualSteps.content: Look for the appearance of a crow, as it indicates a response to your petition.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Thistles
ritualSteps.content: Collect blooming thistles to demarcate the space.

ritualSteps.title: Cast the Circle
ritualSteps.content: Demarcate the entire circle with the thistles, or place one bloom in each of the four cardinal points.

ritualSteps.title: Enter the Circle
ritualSteps.content: Bring the ailing subject within the circle.

ritualSteps.title: Intensify Healing
ritualSteps.content: Perform your healing or cleansing spells inside the circle to intensify the effects.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the Oil
ritualSteps.content: Create an infused oil using althaea (mallow) and your base olive oil.

ritualSteps.title: Charge the Oil
ritualSteps.content: Hold the infused oil in your hands and focus on your desire to heal and repel negative influences.

ritualSteps.title: Anoint the Body
ritualSteps.content: Anoint your body with the oil prior to rituals or going to sleep.

ritualSteps.title: Bath Alternative
ritualSteps.content: Alternatively, you can add this infused oil to your bath for full-body immersion.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Salt Base
ritualSteps.content: Add a cup of sea salt to a small dish.

ritualSteps.title: Add Essential Oils
ritualSteps.content: Add two drops each of frankincense, myrrh, patchouli, and vetiver essential oils.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Blend the oils into the salt using your fingers.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe and Balance
ritualSteps.content: Add the mixture to a tub of running water, soak, and allow your yin and yang energies to balance.

ritualSteps.title: Draw Water
ritualSteps.content: Fill your bathtub with comfortably warm water.

ritualSteps.title: Add Florida Water
ritualSteps.content: Add at least one cup of Florida Water to the bathwater.

ritualSteps.title: Add Salt
ritualSteps.content: Add at least a handful of sea salt to the bath.

ritualSteps.title: Soak
ritualSteps.content: Enter the bath and soak, allowing the mixture to cleanse your body and aura.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Herbs
ritualSteps.content: Gather fresh lavender, mint, marjoram, oregano, and rosemary.

ritualSteps.title: Create Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over the fresh herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Let the infusion steep and cool, then strain out the herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the strained liquid to your bath and soak for physical and psychic healing.

ritualSteps.title: Combine Herbs
ritualSteps.content: Place fennel, dill, and chervil into a non-reactive container.

ritualSteps.title: Steep
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over the herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Allow the infusion to steep and cool, then strain out the solids.

ritualSteps.title: Add to Bath
ritualSteps.content: Add the liquid to your bathwater and bathe for healing and restoration.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Lavender
ritualSteps.content: Prepare either a lavender infusion or obtain lavender hydrosol or essential oil.

ritualSteps.title: Draw Bath
ritualSteps.content: Fill a tub with comfortably warm water.

ritualSteps.title: Mix in Lavender
ritualSteps.content: Add the lavender infusion or oil to the bathwater.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Soak in the water for deep spiritual as well as physical cleansing.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Blend chamomile, elder, mint, mugwort, and other available Mother Holle herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Create Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make an infusion by pouring boiling water over the botanicals.

ritualSteps.title: Steep and Strain
ritualSteps.content: Let it steep thoroughly, then strain out the herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add to the bath, optionally floating wild pansy blossoms for maximum spiritual healing.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Sea Salt Bath
ritualSteps.content: Pour copious quantities of sea salt into a tub filled with water.

ritualSteps.title: Soak and Dry
ritualSteps.content: Soak in the water, and then allow yourself to air dry.

ritualSteps.title: Rub with Roses
ritualSteps.content: Gently rub your body with long-stemmed white roses (thorns removed) using an outward, downward movement.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose in Sea
ritualSteps.content: Wrap the roses up, bring them to the beach, and throw each rose into the sea.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Ingredients
ritualSteps.content: Gather red, white, yellow, and pink roses, along with peppermint and parsley.

ritualSteps.title: Create Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Pour boiling water over the assembled botanicals to create an infusion.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Allow the water to cool and infuse, then strain out the solids.

ritualSteps.title: Soak
ritualSteps.content: Add the liquid to your bath and soak for gentle physical and emotional healing.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over the combined vervain and lemon verbena.

ritualSteps.title: Strain Liquid
ritualSteps.content: Allow the infusion to steep and cool, then strain out the herbs.

ritualSteps.title: Add Enhancements
ritualSteps.content: Add a splash of vinegar and fresh slices of lemon to the water.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe
ritualSteps.content: Add the mixture to your bath and soak to purify and heal.

ritualSteps.title: Soak Rosemary
ritualSteps.content: Soak rosemary stalks in anisette liqueur.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the Subject
ritualSteps.content: The person to be cleansed lies down comfortably and focuses on healing.

ritualSteps.title: Hand Massage
ritualSteps.content: Rhythmically form the sign of the cross on the body using only the hands initially.

ritualSteps.title: Wand Massage
ritualSteps.content: Remove the rosemary wands from the liqueur, shake them gently, and use them to lightly massage the body while affirming safety.

ritualSteps.title: Collect Water
ritualSteps.content: Catch ocean water (or heavily salted spring water) from seven separate waves in seven empty bottles.

ritualSteps.title: Add Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Place seven watermelon seeds, sprigs of mugwort, mucura, and a quartz crystal inside each bottle.

ritualSteps.title: Seal Bottles
ritualSteps.content: Seal the bottles and bring them home.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe Daily
ritualSteps.content: Add the contents of one bottle to your bath for seven consecutive days, ideally at 7 a.m. or 7 p.m.

ritualSteps.title: Carve Candle
ritualSteps.content: Carve a white candle to reflect the person for whom the healing spell is intended.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Oil
ritualSteps.content: Soak hyssop in olive oil.

ritualSteps.title: Dress Candle
ritualSteps.content: Use the hyssop-infused oil to completely dress the carved candle.

ritualSteps.title: Burn and Pray
ritualSteps.content: Burn the candle while reciting psalms or sacred verses dedicated to healing.

ritualSteps.title: Charge the Doll
ritualSteps.content: Hold the doll in your hands to charge it with your intentions and healing energy.

ritualSteps.title: Murmur Blessings
ritualSteps.content: Murmur healing incantations and blessings over the doll.

ritualSteps.title: Massage Doll
ritualSteps.content: Massage the doll with a blend of castor and olive oils, scented with essential oil of lavender.

ritualSteps.title: Ring with Candles
ritualSteps.content: Place the doll within a ring of burning healing candles until the healing is complete.

ritualSteps.title: Bless the Seeds
ritualSteps.content: Bless and charge seven Job's tears individually, one at a time.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare the Bag
ritualSteps.content: Place the seeds in a white charm bag or cloth.

ritualSteps.title: Add Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Add powdered everlasting and ivy to the bag.

ritualSteps.title: Deliver the Charm
ritualSteps.content: Take this bag to the patient and place it under their pillow or mattress.

ritualSteps.title: Arrange Setup
ritualSteps.content: Place fresh peppermint leaves on top of a photograph of the patient.

ritualSteps.title: Charge Candle
ritualSteps.content: Charge a blue candle with your desire for their healing.

ritualSteps.title: Burn Candle
ritualSteps.content: Place and burn the candle beside the photograph.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose and Repeat
ritualSteps.content: When the candle burns down, dispose of the leaves. Repeat as needed with fresh leaves.

ritualSteps.title: Write Petition
ritualSteps.content: Write out a petition of healing on a piece of parchment.

ritualSteps.title: Soak Parchment
ritualSteps.content: Place the parchment in a dish containing Holy Water.

ritualSteps.title: Murmur Psalms
ritualSteps.content: Murmur healing psalms or verses directly over the dish.

ritualSteps.title: Dry and Carry
ritualSteps.content: Remove the parchment, allow it to dry, and give it to the spell's target as a talisman.

ritualSteps.title: Select Crystal
ritualSteps.content: Choose a crystal that feels best, such as alexandrite, moonstone, or quartz.

ritualSteps.title: Charge the Stone
ritualSteps.content: Hold the stone in your hands and charge it with potent healing energy.

ritualSteps.title: Gift the Talisman
ritualSteps.content: Give the charged crystal to the spell's target to carry.

ritualSteps.title: Re-charge
ritualSteps.content: Periodically cleanse and recharge the stone to maintain its efficacy.

ritualSteps.title: Light Candle
ritualSteps.content: Burn a white candle or a commercially manufactured 7-day candle near his image.

ritualSteps.title: Provide Offerings
ritualSteps.content: Place offerings such as a glass of water or rum in front of his votive image.

ritualSteps.title: Make Petition
ritualSteps.content: Recite a prayer requesting that God send Dr. Jose Gregorio to aid in your healing.

ritualSteps.title: Maintain Altar
ritualSteps.content: Maintain the offerings and gratitude until healing is manifested.

ritualSteps.title: Secure Crystals
ritualSteps.content: When not in use, store your healing crystals safely inside an iron box.

ritualSteps.title: Acknowledge Fairies
ritualSteps.content: Acknowledge that fairies are attracted to crystals and can be beneficial in healing.

ritualSteps.title: Offer Substitutes
ritualSteps.content: To remain in their good graces, offer the fairies a gift of glass marbles nearby.

ritualSteps.title: Perform Healing
ritualSteps.content: Take the crystals out only during active healing sessions, then return them.

ritualSteps.title: Boil Water
ritualSteps.content: Boil pure spring water.

ritualSteps.title: Infuse Herb
ritualSteps.content: Pour boiling water over rosemary and allow it to cool.

ritualSteps.title: Strain
ritualSteps.content: Strain the liquid, or substitute by adding drops of rosemary essential oil to water.

ritualSteps.title: Wash Hands
ritualSteps.content: Wash your hands with the infusion immediately prior to conducting a healing ritual.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Fire
ritualSteps.content: Prepare a safe, open fire.

ritualSteps.title: Pass Pepper
ritualSteps.content: Pass a whole chili pepper over the ailing person, as if it were a smudge stick.

ritualSteps.title: Throw in Fire
ritualSteps.content: Throw the pepper directly into the fire.

ritualSteps.title: Observe
ritualSteps.content: Observe the reaction of the pepper to diagnose and extract the affliction.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Stones
ritualSteps.content: Collect three stones representing different suspected sources of illness.

ritualSteps.title: Heat Stones
ritualSteps.content: Place them overnight to rest in the hot ashes of the hearth or a cauldron.

ritualSteps.title: Drop in Water
ritualSteps.content: In the morning, drop the stones one at a time into a basin of cold water.

ritualSteps.title: Listen for Diagnosis
ritualSteps.content: The stone making the loudest sound upon contact with the water provides the diagnosis.

ritualSteps.title: Measure Patient
ritualSteps.content: Determine the exact height of the ailing person.

ritualSteps.title: Acquire Candle
ritualSteps.content: Obtain or craft a candle that matches the patient's height perfectly.

ritualSteps.title: Dedicate Candle
ritualSteps.content: Offer the candle to a spirit or deity associated with fire (e.g., Brigid or Diana).

ritualSteps.title: Burn
ritualSteps.content: Burn the candle to invoke their powerful healing protection.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Mugwort
ritualSteps.content: Gather fresh or dried bunches of mugwort.

ritualSteps.title: Identify Vulnerable Areas
ritualSteps.content: Locate doors, windows, and sickrooms in the home.

ritualSteps.title: Hang Bunches
ritualSteps.content: Hang the mugwort bunches prominently in these areas.

ritualSteps.title: Maintain
ritualSteps.content: Replace them periodically as they dry and lose their aroma to maintain the barrier.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Coals
ritualSteps.content: Take seven glowing coals from the hearth.

ritualSteps.title: Circle Coals
ritualSteps.content: Circle each coal around the head of the afflicted person seven times (49 total circles).

ritualSteps.title: Quench Coals
ritualSteps.content: Toss each coal into a bowl of water immediately following its use.

ritualSteps.title: Dispose Water
ritualSteps.content: Take the bowl to a crossroads, dump out the contents, and return via a different route.

ritualSteps.title: Procure Chives
ritualSteps.content: Gather large bunches of fresh chives.

ritualSteps.title: Secure Bunches
ritualSteps.content: Tie the bunches together firmly with string.

ritualSteps.title: Hang Strategically
ritualSteps.content: Hang the bunches of chives around the home, especially near the sick person.

ritualSteps.title: Replace as Needed
ritualSteps.content: Discard and replace when the aroma completely fades to maintain protection.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Herb
ritualSteps.content: Grind dried Dittany of Crete into a fine powder or keep it bruised.

ritualSteps.title: Ignite Charcoal
ritualSteps.content: Safely ignite a charcoal block in a censer.

ritualSteps.title: Burn Incense
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the herb over the glowing charcoal.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate Room
ritualSteps.content: Waft the fragrant smoke throughout the patient's room to drive away illness.

ritualSteps.title: Gather Seeds
ritualSteps.content: Take handfuls of cumin and coriander seeds.

ritualSteps.title: Pass Seeds
ritualSteps.content: Pass the seeds around the patient's head.

ritualSteps.title: Speak to Spirits
ritualSteps.content: Hold the seeds and speak to the spirits, pleading for their protection and to release the patient from illness.

ritualSteps.title: Chew Seeds
ritualSteps.content: Have the patient chew the seeds (or chew them for the patient and spit out) to seal the spell.

ritualSteps.title: Collect Acorns
ritualSteps.content: Collect an odd number of healthy acorns, recognizing them as sacred signs of life.

ritualSteps.title: Charge the Acorns
ritualSteps.content: Hold them in your hands and charge them with the desire for continued good health.

ritualSteps.title: Place in Bag
ritualSteps.content: Place the acorns inside a green or red charm bag.

ritualSteps.title: Carry Charm
ritualSteps.content: Carry the charm bag with you daily to maintain your health.

ritualSteps.title: Create Infusion
ritualSteps.content: Make a strong infusion by pouring boiling water over dried agrimony.

ritualSteps.title: Cool and Strain
ritualSteps.content: Let the infusion cool down safely, then strain out the botanical material.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Cloth
ritualSteps.content: Dip a clean white cloth into the infusion.

ritualSteps.title: Bathe Patient
ritualSteps.content: Gently bathe the patient with the cloth to repair the aura and heal.

ritualSteps.title: Acquire Amber
ritualSteps.content: Obtain amber beads, preferably carved into shapes resembling genitals (as per ancient traditions) or a shape meaningful to you.

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse Amber
ritualSteps.content: Spiritually cleanse the amber beads.

ritualSteps.title: Charge Beads
ritualSteps.content: Charge the amber with the intention of protecting the body from disease.

ritualSteps.title: Wear Amulet
ritualSteps.content: Wear or carry the amber regularly to maintain a shield against illness.

ritualSteps.title: Blend Botanicals
ritualSteps.content: Blend calamus, coriander, juniper, and myrrh.

ritualSteps.title: Grind Mixture
ritualSteps.content: Grind and powder the botanicals together.

ritualSteps.title: Ignite Charcoal
ritualSteps.content: Light a charcoal block in a heat-safe container.

ritualSteps.title: Fumigate Area
ritualSteps.content: Sprinkle the powder on the charcoal and fumigate the area to expel disease demons.

ritualSteps.title: Locate Flower
ritualSteps.content: Look for the very first anemone (wind flower) of the spring season.

ritualSteps.title: Harvest Gently
ritualSteps.content: Carefully pick the flower.

ritualSteps.title: Wrap in Cloth
ritualSteps.content: Wrap the flower securely in a piece of red cloth.

ritualSteps.title: Bind to Body
ritualSteps.content: Bind the wrapped flower around an ailing person's arm with prayers and affirmations for healing.

ritualSteps.title: Position Hand
ritualSteps.content: Touch the afflicted part of the body with your thumb, middle, and ring fingers.

ritualSteps.title: Stretch Fingers
ritualSteps.content: Stretch the other two fingers straight out.

ritualSteps.title: Recite Chant
ritualSteps.content: Firmly chant orders for the illness or pain to leave, commanding it to vanish from your limbs, bones, and blood.

ritualSteps.title: Complete Intent
ritualSteps.content: Envision the affliction leaving the body entirely as you finish the chant.

ritualSteps.title: Procure Stone
ritualSteps.content: Obtain a bezoar stone (historically used for expelling poisons).

ritualSteps.title: Cleanse
ritualSteps.content: Ensure the stone is spiritually and physically clean.

ritualSteps.title: Bind to Area
ritualSteps.content: Place the stone directly over the afflicted area.

ritualSteps.title: Secure
ritualSteps.content: Bind the stone in place using a piece of cloth to draw out the illness.

ritualSteps.title: Prepare Onion
ritualSteps.content: Take a fresh onion and cut it in half.

ritualSteps.title: Set Intention
ritualSteps.content: Hold the onion halves and visualize them absorbing the intense heat and sickness of the fever.

ritualSteps.title: Place Under Bed
ritualSteps.content: Place the cut onion pieces directly beneath the bed of the feverish person.

ritualSteps.title: Replace Daily
ritualSteps.content: Remove the old onion and replace it with a fresh one daily until the fever breaks completely.

libraryEntries.summary: Often used as a substitute for obsidian in Aztec magic mirrors and carried as a charm for financial luck.

libraryEntries.title: Bloodstone
libraryEntries.summary: A green stone flecked with red, used to heal blood disorders, enhance fertility, and bring success in court.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Soak in rosemary water or hydrosol.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be in direct contact with skin or laid over the womb for active healing.

libraryEntries.title: Lapis Lazuli
libraryEntries.summary: Provides eloquence in speech, relieves speech disorders, attracts love, and is used to prevent miscarriage.
libraryEntries.careNote: Most effective when worn over the throat chakra.

libraryEntries.title: Serpentine
libraryEntries.summary: A serpent stone worn to regulate milk supply, protect against snakebites, and evoke past-life memories.

libraryEntries.title: Agate
libraryEntries.summary: A protective talisman carried to prevent falls while riding and to provide safety from snakes and scorpions.
libraryEntries.careNote: More potent when engraved with specific imagery.

libraryEntries.title: Turquoise
libraryEntries.summary: Perceived as a piece of the sky, this stone provides general protection, good fortune, and fades to warn of illness.
libraryEntries.careNote: It is believed to physically fade or crack in the presence of ill-health.

libraryEntries.title: Coral
libraryEntries.summary: Metaphysically perceived as the ocean's menstrual blood, it offers protection and pales to warn of illness.

libraryEntries.title: Amber
libraryEntries.summary: Fossilized tree resin used as a wishing stone, a charm for romantic luck, and to absorb body heat to ward off chills.
libraryEntries.careNote: Not a true mineral, but treated as one magically.

libraryEntries.title: Diamond
libraryEntries.summary: Promotes self-confidence in sexual matters, relieves inhibitions, and provides a cleansing, purifying energy.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Bathe in spring water enhanced with hibiscus flower essence.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often extracts negative emotions from its mining history; requires thorough cleansing.

libraryEntries.title: Emerald
libraryEntries.summary: A precious green stone used to attract and stabilize love, and to soothe and heal weakness of the eyes.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Steep in spring water overnight, exposed to moonlight.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often carries traumatic historical energy from its extraction; needs profound cleansing.

libraryEntries.title: Ruby
libraryEntries.summary: Empowers the blood system, prevents miscarriage, draws wealth, and fades or grows dull in the presence of anemia.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Steep in pure spring water to create a healing elixir.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be in direct contact with skin to provide health warnings.

libraryEntries.title: Sapphire
libraryEntries.summary: A protective talisman against violence, skin disorders, and a powerful attractor of wealth and financial stability.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Place in spring water under the light of the Full Moon.
libraryEntries.careNote: Can cause fluctuations in fortune for some individuals.

libraryEntries.title: Star Sapphire
libraryEntries.summary: A luxurious gemstone used specifically as a powerful tool for scrying and divination.
libraryEntries.careNote: Gaze at the center of the gemstone's cross with unfocused eyes to scry.

libraryEntries.title: Aquamarine
libraryEntries.summary: A soothing stone used for scrying and placed on the body to ease the transition of death.

libraryEntries.title: Smoky Quartz
libraryEntries.summary: Beneficial for communicating with ghosts, protecting night travelers, and shielding against microwave radiation.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Cleanse frequently when used for radiation protection.

libraryEntries.title: Jet
libraryEntries.summary: Crystallized botanical material used to induce sleep, banish malevolent spirits, and protect against acts of violence.
libraryEntries.careNote: True jet can be pierced with a needle; avoid plastic replications.

libraryEntries.title: Petrified Wood
libraryEntries.summary: Fossilized wood believed to retain ancient memories, used to access past-life regression in dreams.
libraryEntries.careNote: Hold in hand or wear around the neck while sleeping.

libraryEntries.title: Cuprite
libraryEntries.summary: A brown-toned crystal believed to evoke long-buried memories and assist in past-life regression.

libraryEntries.title: Garnet
libraryEntries.summary: A vividly red crystal used to evoke past-life memories and placed in medicine bags for vitality and protection.

libraryEntries.title: Jasper
libraryEntries.summary: Especially the brown variety, this stone is strongly associated with aiding astral travel and accessing past lives.

libraryEntries.title: Variscite
libraryEntries.summary: A stone recognized for its ability to help the user recall and access past-life memories.

libraryEntries.title: Moldavite
libraryEntries.summary: A delicate green meteorite-impact crystal that blends terrestrial and extraterrestrial energies for astral travel.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Bathe in spring water with emergency flower remedy (e.g., Rescue Remedy).
libraryEntries.careNote: Fragile; salt may damage this delicate crystal.

libraryEntries.title: Staurolite (Cross-stone)
libraryEntries.summary: Known as 'fairy tears', these twinned cross-crystals are used for scrying and to protect against car accidents.
libraryEntries.careNote: Lacks the luminosity of sapphires, making scrying more difficult.

libraryEntries.title: Amazonite
libraryEntries.summary: Bestows the courage of Amazon warriors, enhances personal psychic power, and is steeped to make healing eye-washes.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Place in pure spring water overnight to create an eye-wash.

libraryEntries.title: Topaz
libraryEntries.summary: A crystal used to repel nightmares and applied over bandaged areas to speed the healing of burns.

libraryEntries.title: Angelite
libraryEntries.summary: A blue crystal utilized to repel nightmares and summon angels or other beneficial spirits during sleep.

libraryEntries.title: Chrysolite
libraryEntries.summary: Repels nightmares and, when filled with donkey's mane hair, is tied to the left arm to ease irrational fears.

libraryEntries.title: Citrine
libraryEntries.summary: A bright crystal traditionally used in sleep magic to repel and relieve nightmares.

libraryEntries.title: Onyx
libraryEntries.summary: A black crystal generally used to halt nightmares, though it evokes unpredictable personal reactions in some.
libraryEntries.careNote: Can occasionally cause nightmares instead of curing them; monitor reactions.

libraryEntries.title: Flint
libraryEntries.summary: Perceived metaphysically as Earth's bones, it provides unfailing, perpetually vigilant magical protection.

libraryEntries.title: Black Tourmaline
libraryEntries.summary: Creates a powerful shield against psychic vampires and actively repels anger, danger, and malevolent energy.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Cleanse frequently to maintain full strength.

libraryEntries.title: Labradorite
libraryEntries.summary: Repairs, cleanses, and strengthens the aura while protecting against psychic vampires and encouraging perseverance.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Maintain a regular cleansing schedule if used frequently.

libraryEntries.title: Beryl
libraryEntries.summary: Used to cement romance, restore hostile friendships, and summon water elementals when engraved.

libraryEntries.title: Rose Quartz
libraryEntries.summary: A romantic stone that draws lovers towards you and transforms anger and resentment into affection.
libraryEntries.careNote: Can draw lovers overwhelmingly fast; pair with amethyst for stability.

libraryEntries.title: Jade
libraryEntries.summary: Carved into auspicious shapes, it is worn slung around the hips to protect and heal kidney function.
libraryEntries.careNote: Empower by exposing it to moonlight.

libraryEntries.title: Hematite
libraryEntries.summary: A stone that magically enhances courage and daring, while stimulating the healing of physical wounds.

libraryEntries.title: Anachitis
libraryEntries.summary: A gemstone historically held in the hand or placed on an altar to summon water elementals (undines).

libraryEntries.title: Synochitis
libraryEntries.summary: A stone used in conjunction with anachitis to keep summoned water elementals in place for communication.

libraryEntries.title: Eaglestone
libraryEntries.summary: A ferruginous pebble containing a smaller stone within, used to aid conception, ease childbirth, and prevent miscarriage.
libraryEntries.careNote: Cannot be bought; must be found in nature (usually streams) to be effective.

libraryEntries.title: Sugilite
libraryEntries.summary: A crystal gemstone allegedly beneficial for individuals suffering from autism and communication barriers.

libraryEntries.title: Pearl
libraryEntries.summary: An organic gemstone used to enhance the immune system, encourage longevity, and promote healthy lactation.
libraryEntries.careNote: Run fingers through a bowl of real pearls to stimulate health.

libraryEntries.title: Fluorite
libraryEntries.summary: A crystal placed over the Third Eye to open the gates of psychic reception and encourage deep meditation.

libraryEntries.title: Sodalite
libraryEntries.summary: A stone believed capable of magically protecting the wearer against high frequency antennae and microwave radiation.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Intensely cleanse on a frequent basis.
libraryEntries.careNote: Does not replace practical safety measures but enhances them.

libraryEntries.title: Herkimer Diamond
libraryEntries.summary: A specialized quartz used for distance healing and to protect the user from radiation and negative energy.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Intensely cleanse on a frequent basis.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often attached to ritual wands for added protection during use.

libraryEntries.title: Iron
libraryEntries.summary: Known as the Metal of Heaven, it repels evil, enhances personal magic power, and invigorates physical vitality.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Impervious to spiritual tarnish; does not require cleansing.
libraryEntries.careNote: Malevolent spirits cannot bear to be in its presence.

libraryEntries.title: Gold
libraryEntries.summary: A precious metal utilized in magical rites to project energies of prosperity and life force.

libraryEntries.title: Silver
libraryEntries.summary: A protective metal highly utilized in lunar magic and fertility charms.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Impervious to spiritual tarnish; does not require cleansing.

libraryEntries.title: Copper
libraryEntries.summary: A versatile metal used to attract affection and physically soothe aches when worn.
libraryEntries.careNote: Attached to red garters or worn as bracelets for arthritis relief.

libraryEntries.title: Brass
libraryEntries.summary: An alloy metal utilized primarily to create a shield of safety and invite romance.

libraryEntries.title: Lead
libraryEntries.summary: A heavy metal historically favored for crafting curse tablets and binding spells.

libraryEntries.title: Tin
libraryEntries.summary: The metal of luck and expansion, often engraved with auspicious words or numbers.

libraryEntries.title: Moonstone
libraryEntries.summary: A lunar stone given as a gift to protect loved ones while they travel.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Activate by exposing it to moonbeams overnight.

libraryEntries.title: Carnelian
libraryEntries.summary: Worn on a cord over the umbilical region to prevent and block psychic attacks.

libraryEntries.title: Tiger's Eye
libraryEntries.summary: A protective gemstone frequently kept in vehicles to prevent accidents and ensure safe journeys.

libraryEntries.title: Alexandrite
libraryEntries.summary: A highly esteemed crystal used to create talismans for powerful distance healing.

libraryEntries.title: Chalcedony
libraryEntries.summary: Included in psychic charm bags and worn over the breasts to regulate and encourage lactation.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must make contact with the skin for physical healing.

libraryEntries.title: Sea Salt
libraryEntries.summary: A fundamental purifying agent used to cast circles, cleanse spaces, and banish negative energies.
libraryEntries.careNote: Avoid using on fragile crystals like moldavite, as it can damage them.

libraryEntries.title: Crossroads Dirt
libraryEntries.summary: Soil gathered from a three-way or four-way intersection, utilized in charms to repel the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.careNote: Inherent energy is transmitted through contact with the dirt itself.

libraryEntries.title: Graveyard Dirt
libraryEntries.summary: Soil gathered from an ancestor's grave to achieve success in endeavors or assist in fertility spells.

libraryEntries.title: Footprint Dirt
libraryEntries.summary: Earth collected from someone's footprint to directly interact with their personal energy in spells.

libraryEntries.title: Magnetic Sand
libraryEntries.summary: Fine iron filings used to 'feed' lodestones and act as a drawing powder for good fortune.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often dyed in colors like gold or green for a festive, optimistic appearance.

libraryEntries.title: Cascarilla Powder
libraryEntries.summary: Powdered eggshell added to floor washes and protection spells to seal and enhance cleansing efforts.

libraryEntries.title: Red Brick Dust
libraryEntries.summary: Dissolved in water with lye and urine to violently scrub away hexes and crossed conditions.

libraryEntries.title: Alum
libraryEntries.summary: Placed strategically in dishes around a room to eliminate negative feelings and angry behavior.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be replaced at least once a week to remain effective.

libraryEntries.title: Sulfur
libraryEntries.summary: A potent banishing agent used in exorcisms to dispel anger, negative entities, and blockages to success.
libraryEntries.careNote: Has a foul odor that forcefully clears an area of both spirits and people.

libraryEntries.title: Saltpeter
libraryEntries.summary: Incorporated into intensive protection baths and love-drawing powders for explosive energetic shifts.

libraryEntries.title: Epsom Salts
libraryEntries.summary: Used alongside sea salt in deeply purifying and protective indigo baths.

libraryEntries.title: Charcoal
libraryEntries.summary: The combustible base utilized to burn loose resins, powders, and botanical incenses for magic.
libraryEntries.careNote: Requires fire safety precautions when lit.

libraryEntries.title: I-Ching Coins
libraryEntries.summary: Antique coins treated with deep reverence, flipped or cast for intricate divination purposes.
libraryEntries.careNote: Treated with the care shown to prized tarot cards or runes.

libraryEntries.title: Ocean Water
libraryEntries.summary: Living salt water drawn directly from the sea, utilized in profound cleansing baths dedicated to Yemaya.
libraryEntries.careNote: Gather from distinct waves when multiple bottles are needed.

libraryEntries.title: Spring Water
libraryEntries.summary: Pure natural water used to steep crystals, wash scrying tools, and prepare healing elixirs.

libraryEntries.title: Rainwater
libraryEntries.summary: Natural precipitation collected and specifically used to spiritually cleanse and charge magic mirrors.

libraryEntries.title: Florida Water
libraryEntries.summary: A commercially prepared scented water that cleanses areas and massively empowers any formula it is added to.
libraryEntries.careNote: Dispose of stationary bowls when the scent fades or changes.

libraryEntries.title: Holy Water
libraryEntries.summary: Consecrated water utilized to asperge spaces, bless tools, and provide intense personal purification.

libraryEntries.title: Marie Laveau Water
libraryEntries.summary: A specialized charged water formulation used extensively in New Orleans traditions for aura and space cleansing.

libraryEntries.title: Notre Dame Water
libraryEntries.summary: A highly recommended cleansing water used to wash crystal balls and asperge sick rooms.

libraryEntries.title: War Water
libraryEntries.summary: A dual-purpose formula of psychic warfare that causes hexes, but also effectively repels and removes them.

libraryEntries.title: Peace Water
libraryEntries.summary: A magically charged fluid formulation dispersed through the environment to encourage peace and tranquility.

libraryEntries.title: Indigo Water
libraryEntries.summary: Blue-tinted water added to baths to cleanse the aura and guard against the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.careNote: Will stain fabrics blue; use with appropriate caution.

libraryEntries.title: Rose of Jericho Water
libraryEntries.summary: Water in which a Rose of Jericho has rested, used as an extremely effective spiritual asperging cleanser.

libraryEntries.title: Tar Water
libraryEntries.summary: A potent liquid formula dispersed through homes to provide heavy-duty space cleansing.

libraryEntries.title: Magic Mirror
libraryEntries.summary: Used to capture the sun's reflection to banish demons, or for deep scrying and spirit communication.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Wash with salt water or pass through incense smoke.
libraryEntries.careNote: Keep covered in dark silk or velvet reserved for ritual use alone.

libraryEntries.title: Broom (Besom)
libraryEntries.summary: A tool crafted from specific magical branches to physically and spiritually sweep away debris and negativity.
libraryEntries.careNote: Single-use purification brooms should be disassembled and buried outside after use.

libraryEntries.title: Crystal Ball
libraryEntries.summary: A sphere used for divination, scrying, and summoning spirits from its depths.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Cleanse with vinegar water, mugwort infusion, or charged waters.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be kept physically dust-free; cover with dark cloth when not in use.

libraryEntries.title: Magic Wand
libraryEntries.summary: An implement carved from woods like hawthorn or ash used to direct magical energy.
libraryEntries.careNote: Attaching a clear quartz crystal enhances its effectiveness.

libraryEntries.title: Cauldron
libraryEntries.summary: An iron vessel utilized to brew potions, simmer botanicals, or act as a safe incense burner.

libraryEntries.title: Singing Bowl
libraryEntries.summary: A metallic bowl that generates sound vibrations to clear space and replenish energy following a cleansing.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Pass through incense smoke to cleanse.
libraryEntries.careNote: Store in soft, heavy fabric like velvet; improves with frequent use.

libraryEntries.title: Sistrum
libraryEntries.summary: A sacred rattle representing the Eye of Ra, shaken to chase away evil and produce a cleansed atmosphere.

libraryEntries.title: Mojo Bag
libraryEntries.summary: A small drawstring bag filled with botanical and mineral charms to serve as a portable spell or personal altar.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often anointed or 'fed' with condition oils to keep the spell active.

libraryEntries.title: Poppet
libraryEntries.summary: A figure formed from clay, cloth, or roots utilized in image magic to represent an individual.

libraryEntries.title: Milagro
libraryEntries.summary: Small metal charms shaped like human anatomical parts, used to petition spirits for targeted healing or protection.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often pinned to a fabric-covered board alongside quartz crystals.

libraryEntries.title: Zuni Stone Fetish
libraryEntries.summary: Miniature animal carvings that act as vessels for guardian animal spirits to provide protection and power.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be kept in a protected magic box and regularly 'fed' with corn pollen.

libraryEntries.title: Maneki Neko
libraryEntries.summary: A Japanese beckoning cat amulet that draws prosperity, with black variations used to ward off stalkers.
libraryEntries.careNote: Variations in color and detail create different magical impacts.

libraryEntries.title: Egg
libraryEntries.summary: Highly absorbent natural items used to remove psychic debris, diagnose issues, and remove the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.careNote: Discard immediately outside the home without touching the broken contents directly.

libraryEntries.title: Cimaruta
libraryEntries.summary: An intricate traditional Italian amulet usually crafted from silver or silver-colored metal to repel the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.careNote: Can be attached to red ribbons or hands of bananas for maximum effect.

libraryEntries.title: Hamsa (Hand of Fatima)
libraryEntries.summary: A metal depiction of a hand placed in windows or over doors to repel malice and negative enchantment.
libraryEntries.careNote: Combine with an old metal key and a head of garlic for superior home protection.

libraryEntries.title: Blue Eye Bead (Nazar Boncuk)
libraryEntries.summary: Round blue glass beads that use dizzying colors to dazzle and repel the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Cleanse, charge, and consecrate them before use and whenever they have successfully 'worked' for you.
libraryEntries.careNote: Can be worn singly, pinned to clothing, or strung together to form horseshoes.

libraryEntries.title: Horseshoe
libraryEntries.summary: An iron charm historically hung to draw luck, or constructed entirely out of blue glass beads to repel the Evil Eye.
libraryEntries.careNote: Magnetic variations are placed in spell bags for financial goals.

libraryEntries.title: Magic Ring
libraryEntries.summary: Jewelry enchanted to bestow intense seductive powers or to continually transmit healing energy.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be forged by a bachelor smith if used for European healing spells.

libraryEntries.title: Metal Key
libraryEntries.summary: Old iron or metal keys are used to symbolically lock up a target or protect the home from malicious forces.
libraryEntries.cleansingMethod: Heat until red-hot on an anvil for specific ritual preparations.
libraryEntries.careNote: In binding spells, the key must be turned a quarter-turn daily to maintain the 'lock'.

libraryEntries.title: Coffin Nail
libraryEntries.summary: A highly specific iron nail utilized in binding and punitive hexes to fulfill a life sentence against a target.
libraryEntries.careNote: Use a rusty nail as a substitute if a coffin nail is unavailable.

libraryEntries.title: Sieve
libraryEntries.summary: A mesh strainer used in divination spells alongside molten wax or tin to identify the perpetrator of bewitchment.

libraryEntries.title: Colored Ribbons
libraryEntries.summary: Tied around amulets, poppets, or botanicals to seal magic, with specific colors directing the energy.
libraryEntries.careNote: Nine distinct colors are used for Oya's hurricane cleansing spells.

libraryEntries.title: Magical Cord (Thread)
libraryEntries.summary: Lengths of yarn or thread used to physically insert intent, blessings, or restrictions through knot magic.
libraryEntries.careNote: Yucca thread is specifically recommended for stringing protective ghost beads.

libraryEntries.title: Bamboo Flute
libraryEntries.summary: A Feng Shui cure placed lengthwise beneath a mattress to magically alleviate back problems.
libraryEntries.careNote: Position between the box spring and the mattress.

libraryEntries.title: Iron Pot
libraryEntries.summary: A traditional vessel used to boil spell ingredients, brew potions, or process ritual waters.

libraryEntries.title: Iron Anvil
libraryEntries.summary: A heavy iron block used by smiths, utilized magically to heat spell keys until they are red-hot.
libraryEntries.careNote: A cast-iron pan can substitute if an anvil is unavailable.

libraryEntries.title: Magic Sword
libraryEntries.summary: A bladed weapon used ritually to demarcate boundaries and defy lurking spirits during childbirth.
libraryEntries.careNote: Recognized by spiritual forces as an impenetrable barrier.

libraryEntries.title: Ritual Knife (Athame)
libraryEntries.summary: Employed to cast invisible magic circles or silently harvest herbs without alarming their spirits.
libraryEntries.careNote: Gold blades are historically preferred for harvesting certain sensitive roots.

libraryEntries.title: Ritual Fan
libraryEntries.summary: A tool used to direct energy and demarcate a circle in space when drawing protective boundaries.

libraryEntries.title: Staff
libraryEntries.summary: A large wooden tool used to physically ground energy, ward off malign influences, and set magical borders.

libraryEntries.title: Altar Candle
libraryEntries.summary: Typically white, these candles are used universally in uncrossing rituals and to light the sacred space.

libraryEntries.title: Figure Candle
libraryEntries.summary: Candles shaped like men, women, or conjoined couples used to represent the specific targets of a spell.
libraryEntries.careNote: Divorce candles feature the couple standing back to back.

libraryEntries.title: Devil Candle
libraryEntries.summary: A candle carved as an entity, burned in green for fast cash, red for sex, or black for intense domination.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often engraved with the sigils of specific spirits before burning.

libraryEntries.title: Dice
libraryEntries.summary: Tossed in divination, with specific rolls (like sixes) invoking Turanna, the Italian Venus, for luck in romance.

libraryEntries.title: Tarot Cards
libraryEntries.summary: Used to scry the future, or placed directly under a pillow to incubate and manifest a highly specific dream.
libraryEntries.careNote: Use the exact same cards nightly until the issue resolves.

libraryEntries.title: Divination Arrow
libraryEntries.summary: Arrows marked with affirmative, negative, or blank messages cast to receive immediate answers to fate.
libraryEntries.careNote: The blank arrow is necessary as some fates cannot be revealed.

libraryEntries.title: Red Wine
libraryEntries.summary: Used as a potent offering to powerful spirits like Oya, or as a base to steep magical botanicals.

libraryEntries.title: Dark Rum
libraryEntries.summary: A strong alcoholic offering favored by gatekeeper spirits such as Papa Legba and Exu Marabo.
libraryEntries.careNote: Feed rum to concrete Elegba heads every Monday to ensure continued protection.

libraryEntries.title: Honey
libraryEntries.summary: The physical embodiment of sweet water spirits like Oshun; used to sweeten targets or draw love.
libraryEntries.careNote: Always taste the honey before offering it to Oshun to prove it is not poisoned.

libraryEntries.title: Milk
libraryEntries.summary: Used in luxurious ritual baths for prosperity, or soaked into bread as a healing offering for Babalu-Aye.
libraryEntries.careNote: A magical bath combines cow's, goat's, sheep's, and coconut milk in equal proportions.

libraryEntries.title: Urine
libraryEntries.summary: A bodily fluid used in aggressive protective washes to reverse crossed conditions and dominate enemies.
libraryEntries.careNote: Typically diluted in water for scrubbing floors.

libraryEntries.title: Ammonia
libraryEntries.summary: Poured over an enemy's name inside a bowl to keep them locked up or spiritually restricted.
libraryEntries.careNote: Ensure proper ventilation when using this pungent liquid indoors.

libraryEntries.title: Turpentine
libraryEntries.summary: Its harsh fumes are utilized to banish torturous demonic visions and severe nightmares.
libraryEntries.careNote: Not safe for consumption. Do not use around children or animals.

libraryEntries.title: Beeswax
libraryEntries.summary: Melted wax carefully poured into cold water to form shapes that are analyzed for divination (ceromancy).
libraryEntries.careNote: Requires a white cloth and a dish of ice water for traditional group ceromancy.

libraryEntries.title: Cowrie Shell
libraryEntries.summary: Embedded into concrete fetishes to form the eyes and ears of spirits, or added to fertility bags.

libraryEntries.title: Lye
libraryEntries.summary: A highly caustic substance combined with red brick dust to violently scrub away intense hexes.
libraryEntries.careNote: Extremely dangerous; handle with strict physical safety precautions.

libraryEntries.title: Armenian Bole
libraryEntries.summary: An earthy clay historically prescribed to wealthy patients and used in the magical Hungary Powder.
libraryEntries.careNote: Used to relieve smallpox and measles in traditional magical compounds.

libraryEntries.title: Terra Lemnia
libraryEntries.summary: A sacred earth from the island of Lemnos, used alongside Armenian bole in miracle healing powders.

libraryEntries.title: Gold Leaf
libraryEntries.summary: Edible or cosmetic flakes of gold mixed into potions and powders to instill solar healing vitality.

libraryEntries.title: Silver Sixpence (Coins)
libraryEntries.summary: Specific silver coins collected secretly from bachelors and forged into a ring to cure seizure disorders.
libraryEntries.careNote: The individuals donating the coins must not know their magical purpose.

libraryEntries.title: Hartshorn
libraryEntries.summary: Powdered animal horn included as a vital ingredient in expensive, historical healing amulets.

libraryEntries.title: Ivory Raspings
libraryEntries.summary: Scraped ivory dust combined with precious gems and earths to form Hungary Powder.

libraryEntries.title: Sheep's Shoulder Blade
libraryEntries.summary: A cleaned bone pierced with seven silver needles to aggressively summon djinn from the earth.
libraryEntries.careNote: Left at ruins or crossroads to await the spirit's response.

libraryEntries.title: Snake-skin
libraryEntries.summary: A freely shed skin utilized to wrap roots and charms to create the equivalent of a magical doctor's bag.
libraryEntries.careNote: Must be shed naturally by the snake to be magically effective.

libraryEntries.title: Ambergris
libraryEntries.summary: A highly prized waxy substance originating from whales, historically added to oils to magnetically attract men.

libraryEntries.title: Civet
libraryEntries.summary: A pungent animal glandular secretion utilized in premium magical oils to magnetically attract women.

libraryEntries.title: Musk
libraryEntries.summary: An animal secretion incorporated into formulas designed to stimulate raw courage, deep fertility, and lust.

libraryEntries.title: Dragon's Blood
libraryEntries.summary: A vibrant red resin burned to banish negative forces and blended into oils to heal lovers' quarrels.

libraryEntries.title: Frankincense
libraryEntries.summary: A sacred ancient resin smoldered on charcoal to purify spaces, exorcise evil, and summon angelic hosts.

libraryEntries.title: Myrrh
libraryEntries.summary: Burned alone or with frankincense to stimulate erotic dreams, provide deep healing, and break powerful hexes.

libraryEntries.title: Tragacanth Gum
libraryEntries.summary: Used magically for binding spells and to safely bridge the ethereal world into the subconscious dream state.
libraryEntries.careNote: Often blended with elemental symbols to fill dream pillows.

libraryEntries.title: Spirit Money (Hell Bank Notes)
libraryEntries.summary: Paper currency burned in massive quantities to honor and appease Chinese spirits and deities.
libraryEntries.careNote: Required as an offering to convince disease spirits to leave.

libraryEntries.title: Baby Shoes
libraryEntries.summary: Brought as an offering to fertility shrines, or taken home from a shrine to act as a powerful conception amulet.
libraryEntries.careNote: If conception is successful, a replacement pair must be donated back.
